author: Not available

text.13: æt fruman ærest,      folc under wolcnum
text.15: Hwy ge þonne æfre      ofer oðre men
text.18: Hwy ge eow for æþelum      up ahebben,
text.19: nu on þæm mode bið      monna gehwilcum
text.2: hi of anum twæm      ealle comon,
text.20: þa rihtæþelo      þe ic ðe recce ymb,
text.22: Ac nu æghwilc mon      þe mid ealle bið
text.25: and his agene      æþelo swa selfe,
text.26: and eac þone fæder      þe hine æt fruman gesceop.
text.28: þæt he unæþele      a forð þanan
text.29: wyrð on weorulde,      to wuldre ne cymð.
text.3: were and wife,      on woruld innan,
text.4: and hi eac nu get      ealle gelice
text.5: on woruld cumað,      wlance and heane.
text.6: Nis þæt nan wundor,      forðæm witan ealle
text.7: þæt an god is      ealra gesceafta,
text.9: Se ðære sunnan leoht      seleð of heofonum,

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
